title: Jerusalem: the Holy City
creator_credit: E Keller, F Keller and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Concentrating on the historic settings and contemporary shrines of the respective religions, this film develops the theme of Jerusalem as a city sacred to the Jewish, Christian and Islamic faiths. Settings and structures rich in historic association are shown.
